text: Shaheen Bhatt (born 28 November 1988) is an Indian film producer and Screenwriter. She is the co-owner of the Production company Eternal Sunshine alongside her sister Alia Bhatt. == Filmography == Year Title Notes 1997 Tamanna Child actor 2012 Raaz 3 Assistant director 2012 Son of Sardaar Writer 2022 Darlings Producer 2024 Jigra Producer == References == == External links == * Category:1988 births Category:Living people
title: Shaheen Bhatt
